services.title: Balushahi
services.description: Makhan Bada is a traditional dessert originating from the state of Bihar in Indian subcontinent. It is also known as Balusaahi and is similar to a glazed doughnut in terms of Ingredients, but differs in texture and taste.

services.title: Gulab Jamun
services.description: Gulab jamun is a sweet confectionery or dessert, originating in Persia and then later introduced to the Indian subcontinent. It is popular in India, Pakistan as well as Myanmar.

services.title: Rasmalai
services.description: Ras malai, also known as rosomalai, or roshmalai, is a dessert from the Indian subcontinent. The dessert is called roshmalai/rosmalai in Bengali, ras malai in Hindi, and rasa malei in Odia. It is popular in India, Bangladesh and Pakistan.

services.title: Kajukatali
services.description: Kajukatli is a very popular and luxurious sweet item. This sweet is made from Kaju (cashew nuts), Khoa & added sugar; Decorated with edible silver paper & cardamom.
